subject: Re: New page added to website
preview: For now I only want to link through quick links.  The menu up top is already crowded enough, and not all parties have checked the FAQ's.     Femke Klaassens  Marketeer        Veldhoen + Company BV  Li

The menu up top is already crowded enough, and not all parties have checked the FAQ's.

Hi Nicky, 

Yes, it was my understanding that we were only linking to it from the Quick Links section in the footer. 

Femke, please advise if this is not the case.

Hey Heath,

Sorry I am just looking at the website now. Is it correct that it is only showing through the Quicklinks? No separate page tab up the top.

I am not sure what Femke asked you for - maybe this is correct but just wanting to check. I can't see a top page tab.


Let me know, thanks



Nicky Marshall






Veldhoen + Company PTY Ltd

+61416216836 | nicky@veldhoencompany.com

Level 5, 333 George Street, Sydney 2000 | http://www.veldhoencompany.com/


Follow us on

Hi Nicky and Femke, 

Confirming this is now live with your form and the desired toggling functionality. We have also linked to it from the Quick Links menu in the footer of the site.

Please note, we have changed the setup slightly to accommodate for the changes. You now simply enter the question and answer on the edit page section, not by going to the FAQ menu item. Hope that makes sense.

@heath please check.. https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/faq-dev/

by the way, I replace the tools that we used question instead of accordion... what you think?

@manuel on this page https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/faqs/, can you please add a contact form under the accordion section that says: 

"Feel free to ask your question: "

Include the fields: Name, Email, Question. 

  • Can the submitted questions be sent to femke@veldhoencompany.com 
  • Can the message that appears after submission say "Thank you for submitting your question. We will respond to you shortly."

Thanks! 

Also, please see the question below from Nicky about only having one toggle open at a time. See if you can figure that one out.

Thanks Heath - also did you see my first note about FAQs:


One query from me - if a viewer has already opened an answer and goes to open another, can the first answer automatically close when the new one opens? Is that an easy thing to do? A 'nice to have' if it isn't too much work…


Otherwise the reader runs out of real estate pretty quickly. Is that easily doable?






Nicky Marshall






Veldhoen + Company PTY Ltd

+61416216836 | nicky@veldhoencompany.com

Level 5, 333 George Street, Sydney 2000 | http://www.veldhoencompany.com/


Follow us on

YES


Please do!


People submitting their own questions is a great idea. And a great way to have an archive for future content to create.


Let me know when it's ready Heath 😊



Femke Klaassens

Thanks Heath.


Femke, what do you think? I was just thinking out loud so not at all attached to the idea…





Nicky Marshall

Hi Nicky, 

We can add a simple form underneath the current FAQS. It can have the fields: 

  • Name
  • Email
  • Question

This can then be sent to any email address you nominate. Did you want us to create this?

Just thinking… another 'nice to have' - and this might be crazy… but is there an easy way to invite people to submit their own question? Might be a good way to engage with and capture their early interest??

Ah, probably crazy….




Nicky Marshall

My 2-cents worth - Looks great!

One query from me - if a viewer has already opened an answer and goes to open another, can the first answer automatically close when the new one opens? Is that an easy thing to do? A 'nice to have' if it isn't too much work…



Femke, I have fixed the typos.

Thanks!

Hi Femke, 

Ok sure, that was quick! Here you go: https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/faqs/

Hi Heath,



The questions and answers are added to the site. Could you fix the design? I don't think we'll need a search bar for now.



Categories are not necessary either. If possible could you make the box less wide? A more narrow box is easier to read.



Thanks!




Femke Klaassens

Marketeer

Hi Femke, 

Sure, we have something similar already which I have added to the site. You can view it here: https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/faqs/ 

Here is a how-to video so that you can see where to added the FAQs: https://www.useloom.com/share/24b809402d4a4da8ad3decba69440031

Once they are all in there, we will jump in and do some final styling etc. 

There is currently no search box. This will be a custom task, let me know if you need one, they are only really needed once you have more than 12 or so items I would think... but let me know.

Hi Heath,


We would love to add a page to the website for FAQ. These two links would we something that I'd like for our site.


The Nintendo one for the question part, and the youtube one for the search bar part.


Is this something you guys could add? We have some questions worked out, but they're not final yet. I know my way around Wordpress pretty well, so I could probably do most of the work myself 😊


Would just need the basic structure, and have it added to the footer of the website.


https://www.nintendo.com/switch/online-service/faq/


https://support.google.com/youtube/?hl=en-GB#topic=4355266


Let me know what the possibilities are! Thanks in advance!
